value.body: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2 (2000 - writer)
value.text: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2 (2000 - writer)

paragraphs.body: When he was not performing in Godhead, Miller collaborated with Ben Moody and Jason 'Gong' Jones of Drowning Pool for a song, "The End Has Come", which appeared on the soundtrack of the film The Punisher and often appears on Cleopatra Records tribute albums along with the songs of Julian Beeston, formerly of Nitzer Ebb. Miller also worked on a cover album from the fighting game series Guilty Gear, titled Guilty Gear XX in N.Y. Vocal Edition, where he supplied vocals over the instrumentals to create a full vocal album.

Miller also worked on a cover album from the fighting game series Guilty Gear, titled Guilty Gear XX in N.Y. Vocal Edition, where he supplied vocals over the instrumentals to create a full vocal album.
